Articles.Content: So, I based my mission on the idea of flying into the orbit of the sun, refueling withe an asteroid, then flying to Dres and refueling on another asteroid. However, I don't see any asteroids near Dres. I was wondering if I have to be in orbit of Dres, or maybe just really close to it?

You likely need to enter its SOI at least once before you see anything. I've also read that these things are rare, and it can take 20-30 Kerbin days before even one spawns.

Also, keep in mind that you need a level 3 tracking station for any asteroids to spawn anywhere.
